title: Prosciutto salad with a nutty vinaigrette
ingredients: ['1 packet lettuce', '100g tofu, cubed', '75g walnuts', '125g prosciutto slices', 'For the vinaigrette', '6 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '10g hazelnuts, finely chopped', '10g walnuts, finely chopped', '1 pinch salt']
